about: Tireless Intellectual Curiosity. My hobby has always been to create things, from small toys with LEGOS to real electronic gadgets for personal use. I'm always programming something, I always have a project in mind. This attitude of creating things has led me to self learn programming of microcontrollers, web and mobile applications. My professional goal is to provide a quality service, a trustworthy person, a leader who will do everything possible to keep production and innovation in optimal values. Always ready to solve problems using ingenuity, dedication and a lot of coffee.
